name: Simple Grid Layout for 2~5 Columns / 2~5カラム用のグリッドレイアウト
description:
A simple Grid layout system I use when making iPhone size app design.


  • Offset: 20px
  • Gutter: 8px
  • Left Aligned (It was tough making it all center align considering I wanted the offsets to be fixed, so its all left aligned making a few px glitch on the right side)


仕事でiOSサイズのUIを作る時に使ってるグリッドレイアウトです。
